verbs.description: — Trump , [ARG2: financial toddler] [R-ARG2: that] [ARG1: he] [V: is] , has raised Tariffs on our Allies ( under the guise of National Security no - less ) . And our Allies are threatening to retaliate , in kind . So much for boosting the Economy , and ‘ growing that GDP Pie’ for all ...
